thread.title: Daymak Announces the Launch of the Chameleon Turbo Ebike on Indiegogo
thread.title_full: Daymak Announces the Launch of the Chameleon Turbo Ebike on Indiegogo - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Daymak Announces the Launch of the Chameleon Turbo Ebike on Indiegogo
text:
Daymak
TORONTO , Sept. 28, The Chameleon Turbo Ebike is completely customizable via its Bluetooth app, which allows riders to enable turbo mode, off road mode, LED lighting, solar charging, anti-theft motor, eco-mode and multi-level regenerative brakes.
The Chameleon Turbo has enough power to climb mountains and has strong enough shocks to be taken on trails and dirt roads, yet is still very agile. Whether you are 80lbs or 400lbs, it will take you there!
"We are putting the final touches on our app which runs on Android and OS. We've also just added Turbo mode and Off road mode," says Aldo Baiocchi , CTO and founder of Daymak. "Most ebikes are slow and not exciting enough, but not the Chameleon. Everyone who tries it is impressed by the Turbo mode of this ebike, the cool LED lights that add so much safety, and the great solar charging feature. And it's all controlled on your phone, including the anti-theft feature."
The Chameleon Turbo Ebike requires no insurance or license, and is able to reach speeds of 32 km/hr, regardless of the weight of the rider. It has enough power to carry up to 400 lbs on steep inclines. The ebike is considered a power assisted bicycle and is fully loaded with features such as an alarm system, hydraulic disc brakes, front lights, brake lights, signals, key ignition, double kick stand, pedal system, horn and dual mirrors.
The Chameleon Turbo Ebike is available on Indiegogo starting at the low price of $599 USD plus shipping.
The Indiegogo campaign is at:
https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/chameleon-turbo-ebike
For additional information please visit:
http://www.daymak.com/chameleon
About Daymak Inc.
Daymak, a Toronto -based company, incorporated in 2002, is a leading developer and distributor of personal light electric vehicles. Daymak's goal is reduce the carbon footprint one electric vehicle at a time. Products successfully developed include the all terrain Beast ebike www.daymakbeast.com and the multi function Photon scooter www.photonscooter.com
Contact Info:
For media inquiries, meeting requests or to receive a full press kit please contact Daniel Cargnello at Email , Tel. 416.658.3993x258 or visit www.daymak.com/chameleon
